imdb.title: Masamune-kun No Revenge
imdb.plot: As a child, Masamune Makabe once suffered greatly at the hands of a wealthy and beautiful girl named Aki Adagaki, who nicknamed him "Piggy" due to his chubby appearance. Seeking revenge against his tormentor, Masamune works hard t...

episodes.title: The Boy Who Was Called Pig's Foot
episodes.plot: Masamune Makabe, a boy who's out for revenge on a heartbreak, transfers to Yasaka High School. On a mission to capture Aki Adagaki's heart and break it in the same sense as she did to him, Masamune finds out about the Cruel Princess' personality.

episodes.title: Cinderella Doesn't Smile
episodes.plot: Masamune receives a letter with the words "Pig's Foot" written on it and realizes someone knows about his past. Masamune tries to find the person who sent the letter, and it ends up being someone rather surprising.

episodes.title: Yoshino's Magic Show
episodes.plot: In order to try to get Aki to promise to go on a date with him, Masamune teams up with Kojuurou and challenges Aki and Yoshino to see who can get a better score on a test. If he wins, he gets a date with Aki. If he loses, he'll have to live with the nickname Aki gave him until he graduates. How will this end up?

episodes.title: Clear and Present Danger
episodes.plot: Masamune is planning his strategy to get revenge on Aki by reading the shojo manga, "Barasute," but Yoshino, aka Master, tells him he's doing it wrong. Rather than the aggressive approach he's been using, Masamune tries to get Aki to pay more attention to him by ignoring her.

episodes.title: Mysterious Cat
episodes.plot: Masamune saves Aki as she was about to be hit by a car, when the mysterious beautiful girl who was riding in the car comes out and says that she was waiting to see Masamune and hugs him. A few days later, a girl named Fujinomiya Neko transfers into Masamune's class, and Aki's mood has been worse ever since.

episodes.title: Attack! Battle of the Home Visits
episodes.plot: Neko tries desperately to try to win Masamune's affection. However, Masamune seems rather oblivious to this fact and when he gets home, he finds Yoshino and Neko there, making him food. Masamune panics because there are various things from his past that he doesn't want to be seen.

episodes.title: The Tsunade Island Incident
episodes.plot: After finishing their exams, summer vacation finally begins. Masamune plans his next move to get closer to Aki, and heads to Tsunade Island along with the others to spend time at Aki's summer villa. Yoshino tells Masamune that if he's not able to make any progress with Aki there, she would tell Aki everything that's been going on. Once they get to the island, they meet the secretary of the Adagaki family, Yuigasaki, and Masamune tells her that he's dating Aki. This leads to the two having to pretend that they are a couple.

episodes.title: It's Not You
episodes.plot: Masamune suddenly gets a call from Aki on his cellphone. Masamune then realizes that the picture of him and Aki when they were children that was in his room is gone, and he's certain that Neko is the one who took it. Masamune sneaks into Neko's room to try to find out the truth, but is found by Neko. And then, Neko does something rather surprising.

episodes.title: It's Been Called Love and Affection
episodes.plot: After being rejected by Masamune, Neko disappears, and they all go to search for her. Aki seems to feel sorry for Neko since she was rejected, and then Masamune asks her if she remembers the nickname "Pig's Foot." When they finally find Neko, she starts talking about the past.

episodes.title: The New School Term Filled with Doubts
episodes.plot: Another Masamune appears in front of Aki named Gasou Kanetsugu. Summer break ends and Masamune continues his approach on Aki but he learns that he is Aki's betrothed. Masamune sees that Aki's attitude toward Kanetsugu is completely different from how she treats him, so he panics and goes to Yoshino to figure out what to do.

episodes.title: Snow White of the Yasaka Festival
episodes.plot: Whoever gets more votes for their production of "Snow White" for the cultural fair, get to dance with Aki afterwards. The battle has begun between Masamune and Kanetsugu. Suddenly, something rather unexpected happens to the both of them.

episodes.title: Don't Let Go of the Mic, Even if You Die
episodes.plot: Despite all the trouble, the cultural festival is now over. They all end up having an after party at karaoke and battle it out there. What will become of Masamune's revenge?

episodes.title: OVA: Only For Our Mama
episodes.plot: Was bundled with the limited edition 10th volume of the Masamune-kun's Revenge manga.
